name: Hammerin' Hero
description:
A whole village and its inhabitants are in danger because of a terrific Yakuza, Mister Kuroki, who is at the head of a disloyal building company.
In the skin of the young carpenter Gensan, you rush to fellow-citizen's aid with the help of your girlfriend Kanna.
To develop your strengths, don't forget the basics: eat properly.
The more you will evolve in the game and you will be able to do different jobs and use whenever new weapons.
Finally is the well-being of residents very important because then they won't hesitate to help you!
